did.unittitle: Walter Santner Collection of an Etching of David Dreschler
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: 1883-1955: Represented the New York Clothing Manufacturers exchange and dedicated his life to the ideals of industrial peace through cooperation between labor management. In this spirit and with the help of the New York Joint Board the social benefits of the union members were greatly improved.

scopecontent.p: Caption for image: David Dreschler, 1883-1955 ; Represented the New York Clothing Manufacturers exchange and dedicated his life to the ideals of industrial peace through cooperation between labor and management. In this spirit and with the help of the New York Joining Board the social benefits of the union members were greatly improved.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
